trans-unit.source: Contains the service's virtual path when the service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Process Activation Service (WAS).
trans-unit.target: 當服務裝載於網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 或 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS) 時，則包含服務的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: This extension is present only for services hosted in IIS or WAS.
trans-unit.target: 只有裝載於 IIS 或 WAS 的服務才會顯示這個擴充部分。

trans-unit.source: Services can determine whether they are hosted in IIS or WAS by retrieving this extension from their <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 服務可以從自身的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> 擷取這個擴充部分，以判斷其是否裝載於 IIS 或 WAS，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to recover the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.VirtualPathExtension> from the service host and return a value that it is hosted in IIS or WAS.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何從服務主機復原 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.VirtualPathExtension>，並傳回值，表示其裝載於 IIS 或是 WAS。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: 取得裝載 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服務之 IIS 或 WAS 應用程式的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the service.
trans-unit.target: 裝載服務之 IIS 或 WAS 應用程式的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided to support the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是提供來支援 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是不能直接使用於您的程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided to support the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是提供來支援 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是不能直接使用於您的程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the site name of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: 取得裝載 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服務之 IIS 或 WAS 應用程式的站台名稱。

trans-unit.source: The site name of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the service.
trans-unit.target: 裝載服務之 IIS 或 WAS 應用程式的站台名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path used by a service.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務所使用的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path used by a service.
trans-unit.target: 服務所使用的虛擬路徑。
